name: Buffalo Chicken Skillet
author: Mich
summary: Both simple and amazing, this is a family favorite!
ingredients: ¾ cup Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's®), or to taste
directions: Sprinkle salt and black pepper over chicken breast tenderloins
Whisk eggs in a shallow bowl until smooth
Place panko in a separate shallow bowl
Dip both sides of each chicken breast in the eggs and then in the panko
Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook 1/3 of the breaded tenderloins until crusts are golden and centers are no longer pink, about 4 minutes per side
Repeat with remaining oil and breaded tenderloins in 2 batches
Return all chicken to the skillet
Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
